review_text: Welcoming reception and nice room. A variety of snacks to buy or restaurant selections. Even a happy hour!
Excellent all around
Nice staff and clean facilities
Okay, pool was out of service but we still enjoyed our stay.

Super clean, I could smell that they had shampooed they carpeting recently (not an offensive smell). Being physically disabled, I felt safe traveling there with my young elementary aged son. The room was huge and comfortable. We enjoyed the pool and spa tub that were so super clean. I would definitely stay here again without a second thought. The staff was very friendly and helpful.
Would stay again.
The staff were very accommodating.  We asked for a room change due to freeway noise and they didn‚Äôt hesitate to change our room to a quieter area of the hotel.
Wonderful!
lived it !
Good stay, loved the pool.
Clean, great rooms and comfortable
Great place to stay!
the food at the restaurant was not good .

I stayed at a competitive hotel earlier in the week, and so when we walked into this Hilton, I was very struck by the difference. The staff is so nice and professional, the room is huge and the finishes are just so much nicer. 
The pool was clean, the bathroom is beautiful. I will never again not spend the extra $50 to stay at a Hilton.
Everything

Staff were welcoming and friendly. The restaurant was amazing, they serve the best smash burger ever! The lemonade tasted homemade and was delicious and refreshing. The property, inside and out, was clean and refreshing. Would stay there again any time!!!

The check in system was down when we got there, was not their fault. But it seemed like everyone was panicking and disorganized. The lobby air conditioning was out. The hallway air conditioning was out as well. Overall a very nice hotel but lots of issues while we were there.
The 24/7 coffee in the lobby was great.
Beautiful place!!

Staff are not enthusiastic except the bar waitress Saturday night was AMAZING- best part of our stay. Most staff struggled to provide smile or appreciation.
Disappointed I thought I paid for breakfast but then get I get $15 vouchers I paid $18 for. 
Nice hotel, very noisy next to the freeway.
It was quiet and comfortable.  The food in the restaurant was excellent.  Highly recommend eating there.
Great stay!
Property was really clean, staff was on point and restaurant had great food. Will stay again when in the area,

Stayed 2 nights for a friends' get-away weekend, mostly in the hotel just for changing/sleeping. Easy check-in, room was ready a bit early as requested. Clean spacious room, comfortable mattress and pillows. Would have appreciated a little more lighting though, all lamps were small and room was dim after sunset even with lights on. Was really nice to have water bottle-filling station in the lobby---nice touch on a hot weekend!
Loved it once again!
This was our second stay in Wilsonville. The location is great, we have family in Canby. The hotel is nice, well maintained. Rooms are spacious and comfortable. Staff is wonderful!

Hotel staff were very friendly, there was plenty of safe parking, grounds were beautiful and rooms were SO comfortable! We enjoyed the weekend brunch! 
Will definitely stay here again on our next trip to Oregon!
Clean and spacious room, nice restaurant and friendly staff
Very clean hotel, great restaurant for drinks and food, did I mention clean!  Do not hesitate to book a stay here
The staff was super friendly and helpful.
Not very friendly staff
Clean, friendly environment. Great stay

Nice property. While the restaurant is ok.  I think it would be better if not doing breakfast and instead having a continental breakfast included. The quality of the food doesn't match the cost,  and $15 voucher (2 adults only, kids not included) didn't cover coffee and a breakfast. Would rather have it included and be able to pick my own food.
Really nice hotel would recommend it. It looks newish. It‚Äôs clean and big. Has everything you need will be back.
Great room. Comfortable bed. Woodburn outlets are close. Some excellent restaurants nearby.
Very clean
i like the digital connectedness and comfy bed quiet room blackout blinds
If you get a room facing the main road, no way you'll get a nice sleep. Plus, the ventilation system in the bathroom keeps always running and it's very loud. Fancy hotel with bad system.
Clean and easy access to highway.  Lots of food options

The fan of the air ventilation system in the bathroom was super noisy, can‚Äôt be turned off. Seems weird for a brand new hotel. Shades are also not providing enough darkness, so in the morning, plenty of light comes in. But the hotel is fancy and in excellent conditions.
Front desk was helpful and very nice and helpful

We stayed one night while traveling and were beyond impressed! The hotel was beautiful and the room was goregous! The shower had wonderful shampoo, conditioner and gel. The hotel was clean and quiet. We had a very impressive delicious breakfast and enjoyed the 1100 app check out!
Location , restaurant, staff excellent
Our favorite hotel in Wilsonville!
It was amazing. Wonderful dog friendly hotel and staff were beyond kind and helpful. Definitely will stay there again
If you get a room on the same floor as the pool‚Ä¶ be prepared to smell chlorine throughout your stay‚Ä¶
Great stay!
Great hotel, location etc
Always a nice place to stay
Absolutely fantastic! Everyone was very friendly!
Great place
Staff was super nice hotel was very clean and quiet .

Room was big and comfortable.  Great Amenities for the facility and room.  Easy check in and friendly customer service.  The only thing that was unpleasant was that we were issued a connecting room without notice and the sound reduction could be worked on.  We could easily hear the guests in the next room and their barking dog woke us up in the middle of the night and morning.

The hotel itself was fine.  Only issue was they gave us o e rekfast voucher and said it covered us both.  So we had to get another before they would cash us out. Mimosa was good with fresh fruit puree. Pet fee of $75 for 4 days.
Beautiful room, good amount of parking, excellent staff
Super bien
Friendly staff.  Spacious modern room.

This hotel is clean and modern.  The room was nice and large, the furnishings work well with good storage for your belongings if you like to unpack.  The shower is beautiful and the towels are new and fluffy. We loved the restaurant.   The food was fresh and delicious.   The best hotel we've stayed at in a long time.
Nice hotel and convenient off the highway
In my room there are lots of cat hairs.
Beautiful new hotel....comfy bed and nice linens. Would be nice to have breakfast included in stay.
We had an excellent stay. Very comfortable. Very clean. Exceptional service from all the staff. Friendly and convenient. I‚Äôll be back!
Very clean and well appointed. Very comfortable .  Would stay again.
Smells very moldy‚Ä¶ wet carpet smell as soon as you walk in
Felt very clean. Comfortable pillows (hard to find in a lodging).

Really liked the walk in shower with hand held and grab rail, new, clean and comfortable with everything you need.  Only complaint was the lounge chair in the room was very uncomfortable, everything else was good
Everything except the beds and expensive breakfast was good. The beds are too hard and they need to invest in new ones! Other than that it was great.

Hotel was very new, nice appearance & layout for rooms.  Everything also was very clean.  Unfortunately, fire alarm went off at 4 AM, requiring everyone to evacuate the building, and alarm was the result of staff member overheating oven/grill in kitchen downstairs.  Unfortunately could not go back to sleep as a result after returning to room after all clear, making the overall experience less.
Was a very nice place to stay but the traffic on the freeway was a lot! That being said, I also had a sound machine and fan on. Yikes. Very nice place though!
Noisy room. Everything else matters less. Fortunately, the rest is all good or I would have given it 1 star.
Will return
Poor customer service at front desk, waiters and bartenders were not knowledgeable or didn‚Äôt care about customer service
Super clean, quiet, comfortable, easy access to I-5 (without the noise). Excellent property.
It was very close to the highway.  If your used to city sounds it would be ok. We requested a room away from the highway and staff was very accommodating.

The property is great! Clean, spacious, Quiet. The bathroom designed is excellent and the lighting in the bathroom is bright but not too much like institution.
The bathroom lights are motion sensored and dim after a few minutes. Great for using the bathroom in the middle of the night.
The only thing I did not like about my room was the floor was dirty.
The room was great üëç
friendly service, we always stay here when we go to Portland
Very comfortable

Hotel was beautiful but the restaurant didn‚Äôt have a chef working one of the nights and room service for breakfast took almost 2 hours. Didn‚Äôt feel worth the money since the amenities promised were not actually available. Also left my phone charger in the room and have yet to receive a call back from someone so I can pick it up‚Ä¶
Noisy by I-5

We got to property on a thrus..by Friday we needed more towels, we called for more and they brought some more but informed us they only did room service every other day. We left on Sunday and we still had yet to have anyone come change the bed or take out our garbage.
It was a nice stay overall. Their breakfast was good.
Beautiful hotel! Great amenities! Clean!

We stayed at the hotel for 3 nights and room service didn't once come in the room to change the towels, remove the garbage or give us additional coffee pods. Also no glasses or wine glasses. Just paper cups. Not good for 330.00 per night.
A very nice spot to spend the night. The $75 per fee was a big surprise. But I think that is Orbitz miscommunication. It‚Äôs a large enough difference price wise that I may stay elsewhere next time.
It was nice.
Beautiful property with incredible space for dining and bar, nice pool, BBall court and friendly staff!
Very clean.

Beautiful location and ideal place close to my destination. The town of Wilsonville is remarkable and breathtaking in its own unique style. That was a great surprise to my husband and I and we will be staying there the next time we visit.
everything is fine
Very nice hotel and clean. Friendly service and all around a great place. We loved the restaurant
Good
Comfortable and clean room
Very professional staff and nice property
It was great
Easy check-in, lovely restaurant for an on-site bite and good bar service.  Clean, comfortable.  Nice wooded area nearby to walk through.
Big room, and clean.
Super convenient and comfortable.

Clean, modern and spacious! Loved our deluxe 1 bedroom suite and the indoor pool! Friendly and accommodating staff! The restaurant onsite was very convenient with lots of tasty options! We really enjoyed our 4-night stay!
Nice stay
Beautiful and clean
Very nice
Always clean and great service.
My stay was great!
Very nice and clean
Enjoyed thank you.

We booked a 1 bedroom suite for our family trip during spring break.  When we arrived we found out that our 1 bedroom suite was not available and would not be during our 2 night stay.  We were very disappointed as our family was looking forward to the extra space and bedroom since we have a 1 year old.  I am not sure if this was truly a maintenance issue or if it was overbooked and priority went to a Hilton member.  Either way we were very disappointed.
Great service and location! The basketball court was fun for the teenagers. We have come every spring break.
Great stay.

I believe this is about the best place in Wilsonville that a person can stay. The rooms are very clean and nice. The staff was extremely friendly and very helpful. I had made a mistake with my booking through a third-party and they were right there to help me out. It took a little time to get through everything but they backed me up all the way. I highly recommend this property and I will definitely stay there again when I‚Äôm in town.
Enjoyable and pleasant

The facilities and the hotel were very clean and comfortable. Only small issues we came across is the hotel was too warm in the rooms. Unable to cool the room past 73 degrees. So very hard to sleep. They did move us to a different room in which was a little cooler but still remained at 70.

This is our go to hotel when we‚Äôre in the area and our previous stays have been great. This most recent stay was not as expected. The room was hot and humid. We tried to turn the AC on and lowered the heat but the lowest temperature available is 68. We spoke to the front desk and they said their engineer would fix the temperature of the room for us but the problem wasn‚Äôt fixed. The room was nice but it‚Äôs hard to get comfortable in a room that felt like a sauna.
üôèüëçüòéüòØ

Our room was clean but had a coffee maker but  no coffee. When I went downstairs to ask for coffee pods they said they only had a few left. The creamer curdled when I put it in the coffee. The next morning I was on the elevator with a man who informed me him and his and wife had BED BUGS in their room!!!! I checked ours and didn‚Äôt see any, however; all in all it was not a good experience.
Had no room service 5 days. they never emptied the trash or anything. The beds are very uncomfortable and the bathroom only has a barn door on it not a regular door.
Great spot
Relatively new property with nice amenities
everything, beautiful place. rooms are beautifulüëç
The staff was great, the room was clean and comfortable, the restaurant was affordable. We didn't have a single issue.
I think that price is too too high  no  free breakfast included
So comfortable, clean, family areas, outdoor sitting area with fireplace and out door dining.

Outstanding! After a long day‚Äôs inter state travel, capped off by Portland traffic, this hotel is an oasis of serenity. The staff was professional yet warm and kind. Overall this was the cleanest hotel I have ever stayed in. The restaurant provides a limited menu but is adequate. The facility and the setting allows you to recover and unwind. Darn close to perfect whether you are traveling on on business.

Our room was VERY nice and the facilities were also!
I was very pleased with the stay.
We enjoyed our stay.
Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. Property is amazing value for the price. Bed is meh, but definitely workable.
The stay was excellent.  the staff was great. id stay again

Our stay was very pleasant. The only small complaint was cleaning. There were coffee stains and peanuts under the vanity in the bathroom.                                                         The freeway noise was extremely loud. We come from a rural area so this was different for us. With earplugs we didn‚Äôt have a problem sleeping however. 

The staff were very friendly and accommodating! Overall very pleasant stay!
Fire alarm went off at 6:45am‚Ä¶horribly rude awakening.  It was a glitch‚Ä¶
My experience was great , clean room nice staff, they accommodated my request, thank you for everything. Also we had breakfast at the restaurant we enjoyed. I will recommend to all my friends.

We were pleasantly surprised with this hotel as we were ‚Äústuck‚Äù in this little unknown town of Wilsonville for the night and found this updated, very comfortable and welcoming hotel. The restaurant, bar and service was top notch as well!

Close to park and pretty, shaded walk along the Willamette River.  Restaurant meal was excellent.

Unfortunately, we were in the front and the freeway was noisy.
I‚Äôve been in 8 hotels in 8 days. This is far the best stay thus far! Reception was very accommodating, helping out in our room with two requests. This hotel is first class!
The staff was so efficient and so friendly!!
It‚Äôs awesome
great place to stay, everyone was very nice. thank you.
Excellent customer service

We had to visit during a family emergency. We did not end up staying the whole scheduled time. The staff was very sympathetic & trying to find ways to reimburse 1 night (I had pre-paid).  It's a quiet, convenient place - easy to get to Portland & surrounding areas - we have family in Canby. This was our 2nd stay. It's been clean, quiet & the staff friendly both times. Beds are comfy. We will make this our place to stay when visiting family in the future.
It was perdect.
Good
The property was very clean and the staff were very helpful! Would stay here again, without question!
I like how much space was in the room. It was easy to check in and checkout. The staff was friendly, and the view to the outside was amazing would definitely come back,
Excellent customer service, everything is nice, clean and new. Great stay!
Back door didn‚Äôt open with room key. Other than that everything is perfect so far
Nice place
It was a pleasant experience coming back to the room at the end of the day to relax and get a good night‚Äôs sleep with the comfortable bed and nice decor.

Using the app for early check-in and electronic key was great. The electronic key was the easiest I've used to date. The room fronted the freeway and there was significant road noise, made it hard to sleep.
Love the receptionist so friendly. It was an easy check in through the app and fast. parking is spacious and free. will certainly come back.
It was clean and convenient.
I‚Äôll be back if that means enough!!! Enjoyed my stay and my front view, thanks for everything!!!!
Our room was very clean and huge! Our granddaughter loved the swimming pool and didn‚Äôt want to leave lol!
I rook the kids for an overnigjt stay. The fym was great, the pool was great, the basketball court was great! No free breakfast but ple ty to grab close by

Michael at the front desk was amazing! The late pool hours were a hit with our family as we got there later than we planned too. My teens were absolutely stunned with the Hotel. So I‚Äôd say that was a win all around!
Seems just fine. Bed was slightly uncomfortable.
Our stay was short, but great!
Everything was great, as always!
Nice place, clean and comfortable. Good staff. I would recommend it.
The hotel is very nice and clean. Service friendly and efficient. Restaurant is great. Please stock white milk in pantry (mini store) as you were out for 2 days.
Very comfortable, clean and friendly. All the comforts a traveler wants or needs
We are traveling with our dog and Hilton was very dog friendly. They even have a fenced potty area. The room was comfortable and clean. Great experience!
I enjoyed the convenience of the small food mart downstairs.
Great stay quiet area and convenient
Mostly ok
Awesome 2 year old hotel...looks brand new
Very nicely designed room.  Clean and comfortable.  Very nice bathroom and shower.
Modern, clean room. And very friendly staff.
I didnt stay at the Hilton because they changed the price  from the original Expedia price.
All around a very nice stay.
